venues: Subash Chandra Bose Block (SCB) - Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Auditorium
Avul Pakir Jainulabdeen Abdul Kalam Block - APJ Abdul Kalam Auditorium

homepage.heroDescription: Design tomorrow's information technology products, services and systems which combine emerging technologies with rigorous design methods & practices.
homepage.about: Computer Science and Design (CSD) aims to develop graduates well versed with computing approaches and design. The program combines core CSE with Design and Digital Media electives to prepare students for IT and digital media industries like gaming, animation, VR/AR, and for higher studies in CSE/IT or Design.

events.title: Art / Design Art
events.desc: Showcase creativity in art and design.

faq.a: All SMEC students; some events may allow external participants if announced.
No fee for entry; select workshops may require prior reservation due to limited seats.
Some events are solo; others allow teams. Check event card details.
Participation certificates for workshops; winners’ certificates for competitions.
College ID, and laptop/charger if you’re in a workshop or coding event.
Follow Instagram and check the website schedule page for changes.

seo.title: CoSmoG

seo.ogDescription: Design tomorrow’s IT with creativity and innovation at CoSmoG.
